answers.text:
Donald, I don't have any ideas but am very interested in reading what others measure.

author: Donald Gloo
text:
A local government in Colorado that is a provider of cable TV and broadband services to its residents is interested in performance measures for this service area.
What are some measures of input, output, efficiency and effectiveness for cable TV and/or broadband services?
title: Performance Measures for CATV and Broadband Services
